rooms.description: North-facing entrance with reception area that complies with Vastu principles for positive energy flow. The entrance leads directly to the living and home office areas.
Open plan living space promoting natural light and ventilation, designed according to eco-friendly standards.
Dedicated workspace with ample natural lighting and minimalistic design to enhance productivity while ensuring energy efficiency.
Modern kitchen designed for efficiency with eco-friendly appliances and sufficient ventilation. The layout follows Vastu guidelines by being placed in an optimal position.
Full bathroom adjoining the living area with sustainable water fixtures.
Spacious master bedroom with ample natural light from north-facing windows in compliance with Vastu principles.
Private bathroom attached to the master bedroom ensuring privacy and eco-friendly fixtures.
Dedicated home theater space designed for acoustic optimization, energy-efficient lighting, and insulation suitable for soundproofing.
